attributes.action: Inform the public about the dangers of Alcohol and Tobacco in relation to Cannabis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alcohol and Tobacco are far more detrimental to health than Cannabis.

I hereby petition the Government to Listen to the Medical Experts and reclassify substances accordingly.

Inform the public of the Dangers of Drinking Alcohol and Smoking Tobacco.

Decriminalize Cannabis.

I believe it is a basic human right of everyone to choose, For themselves what does and does not go into their bodys.

I believe I have the right to smoke/eat/consume cannabis in any way I see fit rather than drink Alcohol which is toxic to my body and does a great deal of damage to society.

I do not like living in fear of prosecution for my actions, Which harm NOBODY, I will continue to use cannabis no matter what the law is, You can lock me up for all I care, It wont stop me.

Oh, Don't respond to this with vague sh*t like: "Cannabis is Dangerous".
